content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ experience crochet happiness with this stylish top-down poncho first we start by crocheting the neck ribbing in row and joining then work in continuous rounds for the remaining of the poncho crafted in one seamless piece with an eye-catching stitch it s as cozy as it is fashionable made with wonderfluff yarn this lightweight yet warm poncho will keep you snug all season long this enchanted crochet poncho has a stitch video tutorial for the split single_crochet https //brianakdesigns com/split-single-crochet-roundflat/ full video tutorial included with pattern purchase **crochet hook ** hook size 6 0mm 1 used for the neck ribbing hook size 7 0mm 2 used for the rest of the poncho **notations ** removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 **yarn ** wecrochet wonderfluff 6 170% baby alpaca 7% merino wool 23% nylon 142 yds/50g colorway shown hare heather weight 5 bulky optional wecrochet wonderfluff ombré 7 colorway shown kale heather ombré + hare heather wonderfluff **yarn quantities ** 1050 1200 1305 yds 8 9 10 balls for the optional ombré style substitute 2 balls of wonderfluff for 1 ball ombré wonderfluff **yarn substitutes ** viking of norway alpaca bris 60% alpaca 11% merino wool 29% nylon 164yds/50g wool of the andes bulky 8 100% peruvian highland wool 137yds/100g **sizing ** s m l to fit chest 28-34 36-42 44-50 actual measurements are in schematic **abbreviations** blo - back loop only chain - chain pm - place marker round - round single_crochet - single_crochet ssc - split single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es **gauge ** 10 sts and 12 row + 4 by 4 in ssc worked in the round not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 9 **skill level ** intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 10 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 11 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 12 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 13 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 14 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 15 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns 16 it is much appreciated and loved © 2023 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in
